data.message: Reading these comments, I just don't get it. He has ripped on presidents past-present, presidents wives,vice presidemts,Hollywood elite and himself....and now you're offended-please. He's picked at and on his fans off and on for years and now you feel its a personal attack-really. Get over it or move on!! Your wool is showing and it looks like there is a shearing/clipping in your future. Time to take party names away and let the sheep fall.
